#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	   long long  int n,m,sum=0,flag=0,sum1;
	    cin>>n>>m;
	    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	    {   sum=sum+i;
	        if(sum==m)
	      {flag=1;
	      break;
	      }
	     
	    }
	    sum1=n*(n+1)/2;
	    if(flag==1)
	    cout<<sum1-1<<"\n";
	    else
	    cout<<sum1<<"\n";
	    }
	return 0;
}
